Introduction

This version of my portfolio website was created in August 2017 and was built using AngularJS, ES6, SASS, Bootstrap, and Webpack. It is a complete design and code uplift from the previous version of my portfolio from 2016, which did not use ES6 or Webpack.

Previous Versions

2016

In the previous version of my website, I had aimed to be very minimalistic. My background information was displayed in the landing page, and the only other page I had was for displaying my projects.
